dmca.title: Notice of Claimed infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: James R. Duby, Jr. [mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 02, 2007 10:07 AM
To: Copyright; abuse
Cc: support@CcamStudioImproved.com; support@abbeyit.net
Subject: Notice of Claimed infringement

 

 

 

 

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

 

ATTORNEYS

 

3511 COOLIDGE ROAD

 

SUITE 200

 

EAST LANSING, MICHIGAN 48823

 

(517) 371-9835

 

FAX (517) 371-9840

 

E-MAIL Jim@Dubylaw.com <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> 

 

March 2, 2007

 

Via E-mail and FAX

            Andrea Z. Almeida

            The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.

            1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, Texas 75207

 

 

Re: NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT OF TECHSMITH CORPORATION

 CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO SOFTWARE PROGRAMS

 

             Dear Ms. Almeida:

 

1.  Please be advised that we are intellectual property counsel for
TechSmith Corporation who is the owner of the copyrights in and to its
CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO software programs and the owner of:  (a)
the U.S. federally registered and EU registered mark CAMTASIA, U.S. Reg.
No. 2,488,689 and EU Reg. No. 2068575; (b) the U.S. federally registered
mark and Benelux registered mark CAMTASIA STUDIO, U.S. Reg. No.
2,488,689 and Benelux Reg. No. 789534; and (c) its most famous mark
TECHSMITH, U.S. Reg. Nos. 1,749,869, 2,320,170, 2,706,748 and EU Reg.
No. 2068609.  As a result, TechSmith has established its prior use and
exclusive nationwide and worldwide right to use its famous marks.  

 

2.  We have good faith belief that the site www.camstudioimproved.com
<http://www.camstudioimproved.com/>  is currently displaying/posting an
unauthorized derivative of  TechSmith Corporation's CAMTASIA and
CAMTASIA STUDIO computer software program and related marks for the sale
of the same at a reduced price of $7.00 without the permission of
TechSmith Corporation, a scanned image of which is attached.  

 

3. TechSmith Corporation has publicly distributed its CAMTASIA and
CAMTASIA STUDIO copyrightable software programs under its   registered
famous marks CAMTASIA and  CAMTASIA STUDIO since at least November 5,
1999 and worldwide thereafter.  For a full description of TechSmith
Corporation's CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO software programs and related
products go to www.techsmith.com <http://www.techsmith.com/> .  

 

4. The infringing CAMSTUDIO STUDIO program can be viewed and downloaded,
and/or purchased without TechSmith Corporation's permission in an
unauthorized manner at www.camstudioimproved.com
<http://www.camstudioimproved.com/> , a scanned image of which is
attached.  

 

5.  Please contact us on behalf of the Complaining Party TechSmith
Corporation at:  

 

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

James R. Duby, Jr.

3511 Coolidge Road, Suite 200

East Lansing, MI  48823

517-371-9835 - DD Phone

517-371-9840 - Fax

Jim@Dubylaw.com <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> 

Intellectual Property Counsel for TechSmith Corporation

 

6.  Please use this Notice of Copyright and Trademark Infringement to
take all steps necessary to remove and/or block access to the infringing
CAMSTUDIO program and links located on the www.camstudioimproved.com
<http://www.camstudioimproved.com/> , a scanned image of which is
attached.  

 

The statements contained herein are accurate and we are authorized to
act on behalf of the copyright and trademark owner TechSmith
Corporation, said statements being made under penalty of perjury.  

 

 

Very truly yours,

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

/James R. Duby, Jr. /

James R. Duby, Jr.

CONFIDENTIAL AND PRIVILEGED: The information contained in this message
(including any attachments) may be attorney client privileged and
confidential information solely for use by the intended recipient. This
message is for contact purposes only and does not constitute an
electronic signature or an intent to contract unless expressly stated.
If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, the reader
is notified that any use, dissemination, distribution or copying of the
communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this
communication in error, please immediately notify DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC
by telephone at 517-371-9835.

FEDERAL TAX NOTICE: In accordance with the Department of Treasury
Circular 230, please be advised that any statements contained herein
(including any attachments hereto) are not intended to be used, and may
not be used by you or any other person, for the purpose of avoiding
penalties that may be imposed under federal tax law.
dmca.principal_name: Duby and Associates, PLC (for TechSmith Corporation)
